name: Agimat (Demo)
description:
A suspiciously high number of infant deaths in a rural Hospital have caused a young resident Doctor to investigate, especially on the eve of his wife's labor of their firstborn. You are playing as The Doctor. Your objective is to explore the hospital and find out what causes the deaths and other strange happenings in the hospital before its too late.

If you want to reach out to the team, please email us at: kim.umali@obf.ateneo.edu

If you want to help the game by giving feedback, kindly click here: https://forms.gle/pgAUWhLqvzgwP4Y17
